kpi_info.title: MB max load ratio - EMB
kpi_info.use: This is the maximum load of the message bus during the measurement period. KPI used for Ethernet based message bus. This KPI is applicable to the MSC + CDS + HLR NEs.
kpi_info.use_experience:
Must be used the RAW views since NetAct defined aggregated rules are AVG for TIME + NETWORK.

LAST UPDATE: 28-10-2010
RECOMMENDED SUMMARY LEVELS:(PLMN - MSC - UNIT) + (PLMN - HLR - UNIT) + (PLMN - CDS - UNIT)
KPI CLASS: Resource
MEASUREMENT(S): LAN EMB Load Measurement (293/125H)
